name: Kraków Main Market Square
description: Europe's largest medieval square, home to the Cloth Hall and St. Mary's Basilica.

name: Warsaw Old Town
description: Beautifully reconstructed UNESCO site, a symbol of resilience after WWII destruction.

name: Gdańsk Crane (Żuraw)
description: A historic port crane and one of the most distinctive landmarks on the Motława River.

name: Malbork Castle
description: The largest castle in the world by land area, built by the Teutonic Knights.
